recommendations.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
recommendations.match_reason: Epic and dramatic rock anthem with emotional depth, perfect for intense reading moments.

recommendations.title: Stairway to Heaven
recommendations.match_reason: Progressive rock masterpiece with building intensity, ideal for immersive reading experiences.

recommendations.title: Hotel California
recommendations.match_reason: Atmospheric and mysterious rock classic that enhances focus and concentration.

recommendations.title: Comfortably Numb
recommendations.match_reason: Ambient and contemplative progressive rock, perfect for deep reading sessions.

recommendations.title: The Sound of Silence
recommendations.match_reason: Peaceful and introspective folk rock that creates a calm reading atmosphere.
